my_moviemon.Title: Fifty Shades of Grey
my_moviemon.Writer: Kelly Marcel (screenplay by), E.L. James (based on the novel by)
my_moviemon.Actors: Dakota Johnson, Jamie Dornan, Jennifer Ehle, Eloise Mumford
my_moviemon.Plot: Literature student Anastasia Steele's life changes forever when she meets handsome, yet tormented, billionaire Christian Grey.
my_moviemon.Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 9 wins & 27 nominations.
